title: vaTTa vAnam
sahitya:
vaTTa vAnam pOl ulagam vAzhalAgAdO paramA
vaDakku terkku kizhakku mErkku vazhakkillAmal vaLaivonrAgi


anupallavi

  aTTa dikkum vIsum kATrum Ayiram kOTi naTSattiramum
eTTaraiya vAnil aDangum iyalbai eNNi ina veriyinri


caraNam    Atma yOgak-kizhakkuDanE aNU vigjnAna mErkkum onrip-
pUtta malaru maNamum pOlap-porindi inba yOgap-poduvil
